Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 1 Hetugocchaka » 1.1 Hetuduka » 1.1.1 Paṭiccavāra » 1.1.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 1.1.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
Hetugocchaka
Hetuduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
6.
14Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ…pe… . (1)
15Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (2)
